item.title: Open-Source Real-Time Engines and Libs
item.description: Here is a small collection of open source engines and helper libs related to real-time rendering I’ve found for self-learning purposes. No particular order, veterans of the industry mixed with hobby projects. May be useful for someone looking for graphics programming sources of inspiration :feelsgood: The list will be updated from time to time, any additions are welcome. Unreal Engine (web) Godot Engine (github) OGRE (github) OGRE Next (github) The Forge (github) Sokol (github) Oryol (github, web) Wicked Engine (github) Torque 3D (github) Google Filament (github) bgfx (github) NVIDIA Falcor (github) Microsoft DirectX MiniEngine (+Samples) (github) Microsoft DirectX MiniEngine (+Samples) (github) vxr Engine (github) MAGE - Matthias Advanced Game Engine (github) CSharpRenderer by Bart Wronski (github) Granite (github) aer (github) taichi (github) AnKi 3D Vulkan Engine (web, github) Vulkan-glTF-PBR (github) HRE : Clustered Forward/Deferred OpenGL Rendering Engine (github) PowerVR Native SDK (github) Banshee Engine (github) AMD Cauldron DirectX12/Vulkan Framework (github) AMD Anvil Vulkan Framework (github) Matt Pettineo’s (aka MJP) Sample Apps (github1, github2) Dilgent Engine (github) Polyscope (github) Wolf Engine (github) Spartan Engine (github) Neothyne (github) Vulkan LightweightGraphicCore (github) Intrinsic Vulkan Engine (github) bae (github) Ravine (github) GLOV (github) David Grosman’s Vulkan HybridRenderer (github) Neil Forbes-Richardson’s Engine (github) Brokkr Vulkan Framewrork (github) Vulki (github) Pegasus Engine (github) Vulkan Goma Engine (github) Nimble (github) Terminus Engine (github) DirectXTK (github) V-EZ (github)

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Konstantin Khomyakov. I am a gameplay/graphics engineer at Wargaming Moscow. Previously a developer of the WebGL engine Blend4Web. I am passionate about everything related to computer graphics, performance, engine and game architecture. This site is a blog with small notes and reminders I’ve found useful and want to share with the community. Technologies behind the website: Hugo + modified Hello Friend NG theme.
